string-array.name: hostingagame
string-array.item: To host a game, first click the start button (top) on the home page
The next screen will tell you your game ID which other players need to connect
Enter the number of boards and tables you have and setup the movement
Upload a pre-prepared deal file if you want one to be available to participants after playing the hand
Then, when all players have joined, you can begin the game

string-array.name: hostingagamenotes
string-array.item: You must have a player list installed to start a game

string-array.name: movementsetup
string-array.item: You can select a movement to use during a match by selected the movements button on the start screen
The app will calculate possible movements you might want and display them to you along with various stats about each movement
Select a movement using the radio buttons and click done
The movement you selected will be displayed next to the movements select button
Feel free to change your movement selection by clicking the button again
To view the exact movement, you can click More Details in the summary popup

string-array.name: movementsetupnotes
string-array.item: If no movement is selected, the app will not apply a movement to the match
Remember to change the movement after changing the game parameters, or you won\'t be able to start a game
Remove a movement at any time by clicking the movements button and cancel on the popup

string-array.name: joiningagame
string-array.item: To join a game, first click the join button (middle) on the home page
The next screen will ask you to enter the game ID to connect. Once entered, wait to join the game
Enter the club\'s player numbers for the people sitting at your table on the next screen, along with the table number
After you submit the player numbers they will be resolved to names. Confirm the names and wait for the game to start

string-array.name: joiningagamenotes
string-array.item: If a player at the table doesn\'t have a number, either ask the host to add the player, or enter 0

string-array.name: spectating
string-array.item: To spectate, without being a scoring device, click spectate (bottom) on the home page
The next screen will ask you to enter the game ID to connect. Once entered, wait to join the game
Enter your table number and your club number and wait for the system to verify your identity
The spectate screen will come up, click the refresh button to update the stats

string-array.name: spectatingnotes
string-array.item: You can\'t see the scores for boards you haven\'t played yet while spectating
